landing.title: Elevate your design with customizable Vue 3 component library, featuring over 30 components built on top of Tailwind CSS

themes.title: LIGHT AND DARK THEMES
themes.text: Built-in dark theme, try this switch
themes.toggle_desc: This toggle is Equal UI component too

owntheme.title: BUILD YOUR OWN THEME
owntheme.subtitle: CUSTOMIZE YOUR USER INTERFACE WITH TAILWIND CLASSES USING EQUAL UI'S ADVANCED CUSTOMIZATION FEATURE
owntheme.text: Every component has multiple variations, and you can create your own variations at the build and runtime

sponsoring.title: Sponsoring
sponsoring.text: As a project maintained by a single person in their free time, your support is crucial in allowing us to continue improving and updating Equal UI. If you are interested in supporting our project and becoming a sponsor, please get in touch. We would be happy to recognize your support on our website and social media channels.

demobox.changes-applied: Changes applied here affected everywhere on the website

support.intro: We are grateful for your interest in supporting Equal UI! Your support helps us to continue developing and maintaining the project, as well as adding new features and improving documentation.
support.via_crypto: Make a financial contribution via crypto.
support.github_star: Star and share the repository on GitHub.
support.promote: Promote the project on social media.
support.review: Leave a positive review on the project's listing in package managers.
support.contribute: Contribute to the project by reporting bugs, fixing issues, or implementing new features.
support.donations_text: At this moment the only way you can support the author is crypto. All donations go towards maintaining the project, development time, and other expenses.
support.thanks: Thank you for your support of Equal UI! It is greatly appreciated and helps to ensure the continued development and improvement of the project.
support.contact: For any questions about sponsoring project you can contact

theming.own_theme_copy: To create your own theme you can copy on of the initial theme files and make your changes to them:
theming.own_theme: Or make your own theme file from scratch
theming.full: contains classes for light and dark themes
